scripts.preinstall: rm -rf build && rm -rf node_modules && mkdir -p ignore/es5src
scripts.update-gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && rm dist/js/app.js && gulp build && git add dist/js/app.js && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.build: npm run less && npm run 6to5 && npm run browserify
scripts.build-production: npm run less && npm run 6to5 && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.build-element: npm run less && npm run 6to5 && npm run browserify-element
scripts.build-element-production: npm run less && npm run 6to5 && npm run browserify-element && npm run uglify-element
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm run build && git commit -a -m 'Compiled' && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm run build && git commit -a -m 'Compiled' && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm run build && git commit -a -m 'Compiled' && npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
